title: MCPE：Minecraft携带版开发部门增加新成员
author: HotPe_e
txt_content:
本帖最后由 灬友情灬 于 2015-1-18 09:22 编辑 

   原文：MCPE NEWS: Three new developers have been assigned to work on Minecraft Pocket Edition! Will increase update speed                   significantly :)


   MCPE：三个新的开发人员被分配到Minecraft携带版进行开发工作！以后版本显著提高更新速度:)


第一次发布新闻 如果错误 请版主别打我~

replies.author: xiao_zhu_ge
replies.txt_content: 论这条新闻的意义何在。。。

replies.author: HotPe_e
replies.txt_content:
xiao_zhu_ge 发表于 2015-1-17 22:20

replies.author: 我被盗号了
replies.txt_content: 标题改成“Minecraft携带版开发部门增加新成员”更好。

replies.author: WindowPain
replies.txt_content: PE版越来越得到重视了呢~
